select a.name as attempName,b.meeting_id as meetingId,b.attemper_id as attemperId,b.attemperType as attemperType from partner a,partner_meeting_attemp b where a.is_deleted='n' and b.is_deleted='n' and a.state='NORMAL' and a.taobao_user_id=b.attemper_id and b.meeting_id in
